title: Beauty Manufacturing System - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Interdimensional Travel   Modern Day   System Administrator   Transmigration   World Hopping
author: 沾花公子
description:
In order to find her memories, she follows the system to travel to different worlds, transforming women of different characters. Eventually, she finds that everything was never as simple as she thought…

Elder Sister Gao Lengyu, the president of the old cadre, a two-faced lover… Nine different women, nine different pieces of love. In the end, what kind of relationship interconnects them with her memories…>
